sense.def:
Z izrazom
be going to
izražamo prihodnji čas. Na primer, kadar nekaj
is going to happen
, se bo zgodilo ali pa nameravamo poskrbeti, da se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: She told him she was going to leave her job.
I'm not going to be made a scapegoat.

sense.def:
The going
so pogoji, ki vplivajo na našo sposobnost, da nekaj naredimo.

seg.quote: It was hard going at first.

sense.def:
The going rate for something
je navadna in pričakovana cena za nekaj.

seg.quote: The going rate is about £1,000 a head.

sense.def:
To get going
pomeni začeti nekaj delati po odlogu.

To keep going
pomeni še naprej delati nekaj zahtevnega ali utrujajočega.

To have something going for oneself
pomeni imeti prednost ali koristno lastnost.

seg.quote: She had so much going for her in the way of wealth and success.
